name: Voodoo Hunter
description:
This is actually the first game I ever made. I´m not a 3D artist so the most assets in this game are from the unreal market place and only some are made by myself. The music and (most) SFX are made by me.

Please use the saving system with caution, there could still be some bugs especially with the number of enemys spawned. If you have issues just restart the game.

I´ve added graphic settings you can lower if you have performance issues. I still need to optimize the performance so I recommend a resolution of 1920x1080 or lower on low settings for higher FPS (depending on your system).

The map isn´t working 100% accurate in some areas, but it should be accurate enough to navigate.

Instructions:

To exorcise the haunted crypt you need to find 3 runes on the graveyard aereal first. But other ghosts will notice and hunt you! The more runes you have the faster you should run.
